EmailTemplate.name: Case_Update_Transaction_Dispute
EmailTemplate.subject: An update from {!Organization.Name} on Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for contacting us regarding your issue "{!Case.Subject}".
Your case has been transferred to the research and credit department.
If you have any other questions, please don't hesitate to reply to this email or add comments to your case in the {!Organization.Name} Community.
We hope this update is helpful and thanks for your patience as we work to resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Sincerely, {!Organization.Name} Customer Service
